channel.title: Changing Lvls
channel.description:
How would a person go about in changing the required level for smithing something.
I have rares smithing and everyone uses it at lvl 1 smithing -.-' I want to change it to like atleast 115 or 120.
How could I do this?
Also, can a person change the required level for a Crystal Bow. Its at 90 but I want that to 110.
Thanks Buds <3

item.title: Changing Lvls
item.dc:creator: @shapesnatch shapesnatch
item.description:
@shapesnatch wrote:

[quote=“krisdude, post:3, topic:20487”]That didn’t work.[/quote]you would have to change the bar type (2893) to whatever thee items is they are smithing

Read full topic

item.title: Changing Lvls
item.dc:creator: @DAWIGG DAWIGG
item.description:
@DAWIGG wrote:

if(barType == 2893) { //Elemental(Dragon)
if(playerLevel[13] < 100) {
sendQuest("@bla@Crystal bow@bla@",1101);
sendQuest("@bla@Plate legs@bla@",1099);
sendQuest("@bla@Plate skirt@bla@",1100);
sendQuest("@bla@2 hand sword@bla@",1088);
}

this is set at 100 but you can change to what ever.

Read full topic
